title: The Top few inches
creator_credit: Jerry Krepakevich and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Depicts impact of farming on the soils of Canada from the 1930s to the present. Shows soil erosion caused by poor farming techniques as well as leaching and salting due to irrigation. Emphasizes new practice of zero tillage and presents solutions to soil and land management.
